articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Joint Performance of State Merited Chorus and Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Joint Performance of State Merited Chorus and Moranbong Band 
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju enjoyed a joint performance given by the State Merited Chorus and the Moranbong Band for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK. 
					 Put on the stage of the performance which started with the National Anthem were diverse numbers including mixed chorus and male chorus "Mother's Birthday," light music and series of songs "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea," male solo and chorus "We Sing of the Party," orchestral music "Pyongyang Is Best" and female chorus "With Pride." 
					
					 The performers impressively represented the Korean people's most ardent and noblest feelings of gratitude to the WPK which has covered 70-year-long sacred path by leading the Korean revolution, responsible for their destiny, under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Male trio and chorus "Ode to the Workers' Party of Korea" and male choruses "Shine, Name of Sun" and "Song of Korea's Advance" newly created and represented by the State Merited Chorus imbued the audience with the faith that the invulnerable socialist fortress independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence was built on this land and a wide avenue to a thriving nation is being paved thanks to the wise leadership of the WPK which has led the revolution and construction in reliance upon the creative energies of the popular masses, its roots taken deep in their minds. 
					
					 Artistes of the Moranbong Band put on the stage such new songs as "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un," "We Have Longed to See You" and "We Will Follow Our Party Forever" created and represented by them. 
					
					 The songs mesmerized the audience as they represented with sublime and sweet melodies the ardent reverence and trust of all the service personnel and people who trust and follow Kim Jong Un as protector of their destiny. 
					
					 The artistes sang high praises of the single-minded loyalty of the service personnel and people to dynamically make long journeys for revolution, united close around Kim Jong Un. It ended with the finale "Mother's Birthday." 
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience as it has brought about a fresh phase of music representation through a successful combination of Korean-style light music, orchestra and diverse vocal pieces. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction over the successful performance given by the creators and artistes of the State Merited Chorus and the Moranbong Band as it represented the warm love of the mother party for the people and demonstrated the faith and will of all the service personnel and people to remain loyal to the party forever. He had a photo session with them. 
					
					 He highly praised them, saying that the joint performance represented well the 70-year-long sacred history of the party and the creators and artistes successfully fulfilled their mission and duty before the times. He expressed expectation and belief that they will vigorously launch the revolutionary and militant art activities in the future, too. 
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon and the participants in the grand performance of 10,000 artistes for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance of Chongbong Band
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance of Chongbong Band
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, enjoyed an art performance given by the Chongbong Band to mark the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Kim Jong Un appeared in the auditorium with Ri Sol Ju.
					
					 The band delighted the audience by presenting new songs of the WPK it represented in a peculiar manner. 
					
					 The performance began with prelude "We Sing of the Party". Put on the stage were diverse numbers such as female duet and pangchang "Thinking of General", light music for trumpet "We Remain Loyal to You Generation after Generation" and female choruses "I Love You" and "Appearance of Korea", light music "Let's Defend Socialism" and female quartet and pangchang "Ever-lasting Echoes".
					
					 The performers made an impressive artistic representation of the glorious era of the Workers' Party in which all dreams and ideals of the people are being translated into reality under the care of the WPK founded and led by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Female trio and pangchang "Oh Party, It's Thanks to Your Care" and female trio "Our Dear Marshal" newly created and represented by the band impressively showed the rock-firm faith of all the service personnel and people to remain loyal to the WPK which devotedly serves the people, following Kim Jong Un as the protector of their destiny and the sun.
					
					 The performance won the admiration of the audience from its start to end as it was characterized by its perfect ensemble of peculiar voice and color, flawless harmony of light music with main emphasis on brass instruments, sweet and peculiar voices of singers, successful music arrangement and refined rendition. 
					
					 It ended with finale "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea" and "We Will Follow You Forever".
					
					 Kim Jong Un congratulated the creators and artistes of the Chongbong Band on its successful presentation which has exalted the name of the band associated with the noble soul of Mt. Paektu through performing activities and made a great contribution to the development of the Juche-oriented literature and arts. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that they would successfully perform their honorable mission and duty to arouse revolutionary enthusiasm and fighting spirit among all people in the future, too. 
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Jo Yong Won and creators and artistes of the Moranbong Band, the State Merited Chorus and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe and artistes in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Reconstruction of Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Reconstruction of Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the reconstruction of the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory.
					 While looking round different production processes, the premier stressed the need to update production processes, positively push forward the local production of equipment and building materials and improve the quality of goods. 
					
					 Meanwhile, he visited the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory.
					
					 He underlined the need for the factory to intensify the study of the varieties of cosmetics that suit the physical constitution and taste of the people and boost the production of quality cosmetics favored by customers.
					
					 And he looked round the movable net ring fish breeding ground. He stressed the need to put the fish farming on a scientific and intensive basis by taking advantage of the Taedong River and increase the productivity.

articles.title: Congratulations to Vice Prime Minister and Foreign Minister of Nepal
articles.content:
Congratulations to Vice Prime Minister and Foreign Minister of Nepal
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on Monday sent a congratulatory message to Kamal Thapa upon his appointment as vice prime minister and foreign minister of Nepal.
					 The message expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger through mutual visits and contacts and wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Director of Regional Office for Southeast Asia of WHO Here
articles.content:
Director of Regional Office for Southeast Asia of WHO Here
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Poonam Khetrapal Singh, director of the Regional Office for Southeast Asia of the WHO, and his party arrived here Monday to take part in the WHO Southeast Asian regional seminar on traditional medicine.

articles.title: Director of Regional Office for Southeast Asia of WHO Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Director of Regional Office for Southeast Asia of WHO Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The director of the Regional Office for Southeast Asia of the WHO and his party visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Monday.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of political officials of the Vietnam People's Army headed by Deputy Head of its General Political Department Nguyen Trong Nghia arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: German Delegation Here
articles.content:
German Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the German-Korean Parliamentary Friendship Group led by Chairman Hartmut Koschyk arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Foreign Figures and Organs
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Foreign Figures and Organ
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from the chief engineer of the Kraspark Co., Ltd. of Russia, the general manager of the Badr Contracting and Trading W.L.L. of Qatar, the director of Wuxi Huameida Plaza Hotel in Jiangsu Province, China and the HPR Electronic Co., Ltd in Dandong, China.
					 The chief engineer of Russia, the general manager of Qatar, the director of the hotel and the director of the electronic Co., Ltd. handed gifts over to the DPRK ambassadors to their relevant countries and officials concerned on Sep. 29 and Oct. 8.

articles.title: Anniversary of Pyongyang General Printing Plant Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Pyongyang General Printing Plant Marked
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang General Printing Plant held a meeting at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to mark its 70th birthday. 
					 The general printing plant was founded on Oct. 20, Juche 34 (1945) as a leading printing industry of the nation.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung unrolled a blueprint for building of a new modern printing plant, personally chose the site for the plant and visited it several times, clearly indicating  tasks and ways for building the Juche-oriented printing industry.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il fixed Oct. 20, 1945, the day it printed the first portrait of the President, as the foundation day of the plant.
					
					 The plant has fulfilled its revolutionary duty by recording a proud history of its development with loyalty and feats under the leadership and meticulous care of the peerlessly great persons since its foundation.

articles.title: New Kind of Filter Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Filter Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A new kind of drinks filter was developed by the Korea Rungna 888 General Trading Corporation in the DPRK.
					 The filter, made of diatomite as main material, is capable of capturing 0.15?-sized yellow sandy dust and suspended matters and killing pathogenic bacteria.
					
					 Highly resistant to acid and alkali, it is considered to have filtration rate of over 99.9 percent. 
					
					 The corporation manufactures various-shaped filters for different uses.

articles.title: 40th anniversary of founding of Wangjaesan Revolutionary Site Management Office Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Founding of Wangjaesan Revolutionary Site Management Office Marked
 Onsong, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Revolutionary Site Management Office marked the 40th anniversary of its founding.
					 The revolutionary site is a sacred place of revolution in which President Kim Il Sung laid down a strategic line on expanding the anti-Japanese armed struggle into the homeland and arouse all people to victory in the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. It turned into a grand open-air museum under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The management office has covered a proud of development over the past 40 years under the leadership and meticulous care of the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader since it was founded on October 19, Juche 64 (1975)
					
					 Officials and employees of the management office have made devoted efforts to creditably fulfill their honorable task as firm protectors of the revolutionary traditions of Juche and positive information workers for them.
					
					 There took place a meeting marking the 40th anniversary of its founding on Monday.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Preserving Fine Art Pieces
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Preserving Fine Art Pieces
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Korean Art Gallery has made signal achievements in a work to preserve fine art pieces for good.
					 According to Sin Yong Min, section chief of the Gallery, its employees succeeded in developing nano-coating materials for the protection of Korean and oil paintings, in close touch with the Pyongyang University of Printing and other relevant units.
					
					 They also developed an ultraviolet-ray-resistant masking reagent with nano technology to prevent the discoloration of art pieces.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Anti-DPRK Farce under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Anti-DPRK Farce under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea staged a shameful anti-DPRK farce with her master Obama in the U.S. in the eyes of the world.
					 She let loose impertinent remarks in "a joint statement on the north" and a joint press interview with the U.S. president that they "wouldn't acknowledge the north as a nuclear weapons state," "stricter sanctions is indispensabl"e and the "human rights issue of the north is deplorable."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary that this U.S.-south Korea orchestrated farce has drawn derision and criticism from the world people as trite sophism. 
					
					 Her speaking ill of the most dignified social system in the DPRK is none other than a scream of those displeased with the reality in the DPRK much better than their worst tundra of democracy and graveyard of human rights in the world, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 Being a person who learns nothing but evil things and is steeped in confrontational ambition to the marrow of her bones, what would she say?
					
					 She would be seriously mistaken if she thinks she can scare the DPRK with "the joint statement on the north" with her master.
					
					 She should clearly understand a catastrophic consequence to be entailed by her reckless words and deeds.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should be wise to bear in mind the historical lesson from the pitiful ruin met by confrontation maniacs who stood against the fellow countrymen with the backing of outside forces.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Condemns Authorities for Justifying Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Condemns Authorities for Justifying Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News, the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1 200th Wednesday meeting before the Japanese embassy in Seoul and condemned the authorities for pushing ahead with the system for introducing "state-compiled history textbooks" in a bid to justify the sexual slavery.
					 Speakers at the meeting accused the authorities of announcing the above-said system under the pretext of the people's unity.
					
					 The above-said system is aimed to cover the crimes committed by Japan and justify them.
					
					 The present chief executive is working hard to embellish the pro-Japanese policy and dictatorship in the history textbooks just as the Japanese authorities refuse to admit their war crimes.
					
					 They declared that they would carry on their actions till the Japanese authorities make formal apology and legal reparation for them.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Korean Victims of Forcible Drafting Held in Japan
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Korean Victims of Forcible Drafting Held in Japan
 Tokyo, October 18 (KNS-KCNA) -- A memorial service for the Korean victims of forcible drafting by the Japanese imperialists took place in Utsunomiya City, Tochigi Prefecture, Japan on Oct. 10.
					 Present there were Choe Jo Ung, chairman of the Tochigi Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Koreans in Japan, Kaneda Sadao, vice-chairman of the Tochigi Prefectural People's Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship, and Japanese citizens.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting charged that Japan has been busy becoming a country capable of fighting a war for the past 70 years since the end of the Second World War.
					
					 Moves to put under the carpet the historical truth behind the forcible drafting of Koreans by the Japanese imperialists have been witnessed across Japan, they said.
					
					 Despite such moves, a memorial monument to the Korean victims of the forcible drafting has been erected, they noted, adding they would further their activities to demand Japan's redemption of the past, not forgetting the crime-woven history of the Japanese imperialists.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given in Serbia and a meeting and seminar in Kyrgyzstan and Benin on October 8 and 9 in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). They were sponsored by preparatory committees.
					 Lazar Aksentijevich, chairman of the preparatory committee of the New Yugoslav Communist Party for celebrating the 70th anniversary of the founding of the WPK, noted in the lecture that leader Kim Jong Il made tireless efforts to develop the WPK into the party of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung from his start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK to the last moments of his life.
					
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Kyrgyz preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversary of the founding of the WPK, said in his speech that the WPK advanced along the road of victory only creating world-startling miracles and innovations under the wise guidance of the great leaders of the Korean people Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin national preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversary of the founding of the WPK, and Pascal Zouncheme, chief secretary of the committee, said that Marshal Kim Jong Un set it as the supreme programme of the WPK to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and has developed the party into the invincible revolutionary party.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Kyrgyzstan.

articles.title: Bulgarian Personage Wishes WPK Successes
articles.content:
Bulgarian Personage Wishes WPK Successes
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, issued a statement on October 9 to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The statement said:
					
					 I sincerely wish the WPK headed by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un fresh successes in the building of a thriving socialist nation for the rosy future of the younger generation. 
					
					 Under the guidance of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung the WPK led the Korean people in the struggle to build the Korean-style socialist society, most advantageous and progressive in the world. 
					
					 Thanks to the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Il who carried forward the revolutionary cause of Comrade Kim Il Sung, the WPK smashed the persistent moves of the imperialists, revisionists and renegade socialists and pursued the unique Songun politics to defend socialism and made great efforts to creating circumstances favorable for the Korean people's cause for national reunification. 
					
					 The revolutionary ideology and leadership exploits of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are shining brighter by Comrade Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Under the tested leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un the WPK and the Korean people are working eye-opening miracles and innovations day by day in the building of a thriving socialist nation despite the persistent obstructive maneuvers of the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Support Appeal for 2017 Meeting in Praise of Great Men of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Support Appeal for 2017 Meeting in Praise of Great Men of Mt. Paektu 
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea expressed full support for the appeal made public at the preparatory meeting for the 2017 Meeting in Praise of Great Men of Mt. Paektu. 
					 The organizations in a joint statement on October 12 said that in Juche 106 (2017) they will celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the fifth anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK. 
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 It is the steadfast will of all friends of Korea and progressives in the world to highly praise the undying exploits of the great men of Mt. Paektu who provided the Korean people with freedom, independence and happiness. 
					
					 The appeal called for forming preparatory committees for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star in 2017 in regions and countries from next year and widely launching diverse activities in praise of the great men of Mt. Paektu. It also called for conducting colorful activities for friendship and cultural exchange and steadily developing the relations of friendship and cooperation with the DPRK, fully supporting the Korean people in their drive for building a thriving nation and holding a grand international meeting in praise of the great men of Mt. Paektu and revving up the festive mood in the significant 2017. 
					
					 We fully support the appeal made public at the preparatory meeting for the 2017 Meeting in Praise of Great Men of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 We will organize preparatory committees and celebrate the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star with splendor. 
					
					 We will stage multifarious activities to widely introduce the brilliant exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un among the Swiss people and make them fully support the just struggle of the Korean people for reunification of the country.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked in Germany
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in Germany 
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its internet homepage special articles to mark the 18th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and its 70th founding anniversary. 
					 The organization on October 8 posted several articles introducing the Korean people who are making achievements in the revolution and construction under the leadership of the WPK together with photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 An article titled "70 year-long history of WPK shining with victory and glory" said the WPK which declared its foundation on October 10, 1945 has its origin from the Down-with-Imperialism Union. The WPK's 70 year-long history is the history of progress, innovation, enthusiasm and devotion without decrepitude and stagnation and stalemate, it added. 
					
					 An article titled "People's mind" said Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary ideology of Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism with his distinguished ideological and theoretical activities and built the party into his glorious party. It is his special exploit that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the mother party, invincible one, and demonstrated the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's Korea over the world, the article added. 
					
					 Another article titled "Mother party" on October 9 said the WPK has been engraved in the hearts of the Korean people as mother over the seven decades since its foundation.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Marked in Syria
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Marked in Syria
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Syrian news agency and newspapers carried special articles from October 7 to 9 in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 SANA made a report under the title of "People's Korea, celebration of 70th founding anniversary of WPK, course of protecting people", accompanied by photos of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 It said: Supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un is the distinguished great man wisely leading the WPK which has seven-decade long history. His politics of loving the people is highly praised and the people's trust in the leader is growing deeper day by day. This is the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 It introduced in detail the fact the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung has glorified the grim annals of the revolution with proud victory and glory. 
					
					 The paper Al Baath in an article titled "WPK's 70 years of leading people" referred to the course of the WPK, saying that it is the ever-victorious iron-willed party which led the friendly Korean people to victory by weathering all hardships of history for seven decades since its foundation. 
					
					 The paper Al Thawrah carried an article titled "Celebration of 70th founding anniversary of WPK, HE Kim Jong Un's revolutionary theory clarifies how to defend sovereignty of country". 
					
					 The paper Tishrin in an article titled "WPK, 70 years of struggle" said the WPK led by Kim Jong Un will win victory forever, enjoying full support and trust from the people as a mother party. 
					
					 The paper Al Nour in an article introduced the leadership ability of Kim Jong Un who is leading the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 It said the DPRK will emerge as a thriving nation in the near future thanks to HE Kim Jong Un possessed of outstanding leadership arts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Egypt
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was published in booklet by the Nath Publishing House of Egypt on October 10.
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with leader Kim Jong Il's exploits of Songun revolution, the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of Songun revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Coro Estatal Benemerito y Banda Moranbong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Coro Estatal Benemerito y Banda Moranbong
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion conjunta ofrecida por el Coro Estatal Benemerito y la Banda Moranbong con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					El Mariscal junto con Ri Sol Ju salio al palco principal.
					
					Los artistas ofrecieron una escena hermosa con los himnos de la epoca, canciones de marcha hacia la victoria final, descritos de manera nueva y particular, que demandan el Partido y la Revolucion y aspiran los habitantes, desplegando el espiritu de creacion revolucionario y combativo. 
					
					En la escena, iniciada con el Himno Patriotico, se pusieron el coro mixto y el masculino "Cumpleanos de Madre", la musica ligera y la serie de canciones "Viva el Partido del Trabajo de Corea", el solo masculino y el coro "Cantamos el partido", el coro masculino "Aspecto de Corea", la musica instrumental y cancion "Amamos", la musica orquestal "Pyongyang es la mejor", el coro femenino "Con orgullo", entre otras piezas.
					
					Los artistas mostraron con emocion la mas ardiente y noble idea y sentimiento del pueblo coreano hacia el PTC que bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y del Mariscal Kim Jong Un registro la sagrada historia de 70 anos dirigiendo la revolucion coreana siendo responsable del destino del pueblo.
					
					El trio masculino y el coro "Himno al Partido del Trabajo de Corea", los coros masculinos "Brille el nombre del Sol" y "Cancion de marcha de Corea", creados y descritos nuevamente por el Coro Estatal Benemerito, grabaron en el corazon de los espectadores el hecho de que gracias a la sabia direccion del PTC, que arraigo en el alma del pueblo y oriento la revolucion y la construccion a base de la creatividad de las masas populares, se levanto en el territorio coreano un fuerte baluarte socialista independiente, autarquico y autodefensivo y se abre el ancho camino de la construccion de la patria prospera.
					
					Las actrices de la Banda Moranbong cantaron las canciones, tambien nuevamente creadas, tales como "Nuestro camarada Kim Jong Un", "Queremos ver a Vd.", "Anoranza es mi felicidad", "Guia del destino", "Amamos el estandarte partidista" y "Seguiremos siempre a nuestro partido".
					
					Las canciones, que reflejaron en la melodia solemne y debil la ardiente veneracion y confianza del ejercito y el pueblo que siguen al Mariscal como el cielo, dieron gran emocion a los espectadores.
					
					La funcion termino con el epilogo "Cumpleanos de la Madre" elogiando en tono alto la fidelidad invariable del ejercito y pueblo de Corea a seguir el lejano camino de la revolucion uniendose compactamente entorno al Mariscal.
					
					La funcion fue el objeto de grandes elogios de la audiencia  por haber creado la nueva descripcion musical de nuevo plano combinando a estilo coreano la musica ligera, la orquestal y distintas piezas vocales.
					
					El Mariscal se mostro muy satisfecho de que los creadores y artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito y la banda Moranbong hayan ofrecido la excelente funcion artistica que patentiza el amor y sentimiento del Partido madre al pueblo y muestra la conviccion y voluntad de todos los militares y civiles coreanos de ser fieles de generacion en generacion al Partido, y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Aprecio altamente diciendo que la funcion conjunta reflejo vividamente la sagrada historia de 70 anos del PTC y que los creadores y artistas cumplen bien su mision y deber asumidos ante la epoca y expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los ejecutantes desarrollaran activamente tambien en el futuro las actividades artisticas de caracter revolucionario y combativo.
					
					La vieron Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon y los participantes en la gran funcion de diez mil personas por el septuagesimo aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de banda Chongbong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de banda Chongbong
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, vio la funcion de la banda Chongbong ofrecida por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					El Mariscal salio al asiento junto con Ri Sol Ju.
					
					Los artistas prepararon la funcion con los himnos al Partido del Trabajo de Corea descritos de manera nueva y especifica.
					
					En la funcion, comenzada con el preludio "Cantamos el partido", se pusieron diversas piezas como el duo femenino y el bangchang "Anoranza al General", la musica ligera para el trompeta "Quedaremos fieles de generacion en generacion", los coros femeninos "Amamos" y "Aspecto de Corea", la musica ligera "Defendamos el socialismo", el cuarteto femenino, bangchang "Eco eterno", etc.
					
					Los ejecutantes describieron con emocion artistica la orgullosa epoca del PTC en que se convierten en realidad todos los suenos e ideales del pueblo bajo el regazo del PTC, fundado y dirigido por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El trio femenino y bangchang "Por tener al partido" y el trio femenino "Nuestro querido Mariscal", creados nuevamente, demostraron bien la conviccion ferrea del ejercito y el pueblo de sostener al Mariscal como cielo del destino y sol de la vida y apoyar con fidelidad al PTC que sirve con abnegacion solo al pueblo.
					
					La funcion realizo la completa armonia con la particular concordancia de las voces y tonos y la musica ligera basada en los instrumentos de viento y creo un misterioso mundo musical con las voces hermosas y particulares de las cantantes y el particular arreglo musical y la interpretacion musical, lo cual causo gran admiracion de los espectadores. 
					
					La funcion termino con el epilogo "Viva el Partido del Trabajo de Corea" y "Aunque esta lejos".
					
					El Mariscal felicito los exitos de los creadores y artistas de la banda quienes contribuyen mucho al desarrollo de la literatura y arte del Juche exaltando con sus practicas el nombre de su banda, impregnado del espiritu vivido del monte Paektu.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y artistas de la banda cumpliran con su mision y deber honorables asumidas en el trabajo para avivar el fervor revolucionario y combativo de todos los militares y civiles coreanos.
					
					La vieron Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Jo Yong Won, los creadores y artistas de la banda Moranbong, el Coro Estatal Benemerito y de Conjunto Artistico Wangjaesan, asi como los artistas capitalinos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 19 en un ambiente fraternal en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por Nam Sung U, vicepresidente del Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon).

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju averigua remodelacion de Fabrica de Alimentos para Ninos de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju averigua remodelacion de Fabrica de Alimentos para Ninos de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, se cercioro sobre el terreno del estado de remodelacion de la Fabrica de Alimentos para Ninos de Pyongyang.
					Recorriendo varios procesos de produccion, Pak subrayo la necesidad de acelerar la modernizacion de los procesos de produccion y la produccion nacional de equipos y materiales y de elevar la calidad de los articulos.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier recorrio la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang.
					
					Alli se refirio a la necesidad de profundizar la investigacion sobre los cosmeticos de varias clases adecuados a la constitucion fisica y el gusto del pueblo coreano y producir mucho mas los cosmeticos de buena calidad que ganen la reputacion del pueblo.
					
					Ademas, el recorrio el criadero de red movil que gestiona la Ciudad de Pyongyang, ocasion en la cual exhorto a realizar la cientifizacion y la intensificacion de la piscicultura y elevar la productividad, al utilizar eficazmente el rio Taedong.
